018package org.tquadrat.foundation.config.spi;
019
020import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
021import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
022
023import org.apiguardian.api.API;
024import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
025import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.Argument;
026import org.tquadrat.foundation.config.cli.CmdLineValueHandler;
027import org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils;
028
029/**
030 *  Run-time copy of the
031 *  {@link Argument &#64;Argument}
032 *  annotation. By definition, unnamed options are arguments (and instances of
033 *  this class). Named options are actually another subclass
034 *  of
035 *  {@link CLIDefinition}.
036 *
037 *  @see CLIOptionDefinition
038 *
039 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
040 *  @thanks Mark Sinke
041 *  @version $Id: CLIArgumentDefinition.java 884 2021-03-22 18:02:51Z tquadrat $
042 *  @since 0.0.1
043 *
044 *  @UMLGraph.link
045 */
046@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: CLIArgumentDefinition.java 884 2021-03-22 18:02:51Z tquadrat $" )
047@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.1" )
048public class CLIArgumentDefinition extends CLIDefinition
049{
050        /*------------*\
051    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
052        \*------------*/
053    /**
054     *  The index; only used for arguments (not for options).
055     */
056    private final int m_Index;
057
058        /*--------------*\
059    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
060        \*--------------*/
061    /**
062     *  Creates a new {@code CLIArgumentDefinition} instance.
063     *
064     *  @param  property    The name of the property.
065     *  @param  index   The position for this argument on the command line.
066     *  @param  usage   The usage text.
067     *  @param  usageKey    The resource bundle key for the usage text.
068     *  @param  metaVar The meta variable name.
069     *  @param  required    {@code true} if the argument or option is
070     *      mandatory.
071     *  @param  handler The handler for the option or argument value.
072     *  @param  multiValued {@code true} if the option or argument allows
073     *      more than one value.
074     *  @param  format  The optional format.
075     */
076    @SuppressWarnings( "BooleanParameter" )
077    public CLIArgumentDefinition( final String property, final int index, final String usage, final String usageKey, final String metaVar, final boolean required, final CmdLineValueHandler<?> handler, final boolean multiValued, final String format )
078    {
079        super( property, true, usage, usageKey, requireNotEmptyArgument( metaVar, "metaVar" ), required, handler, multiValued, format );
080        m_Index = index;
081    }   //  CLIArgumentDefinition()
082
083        /*---------*\
084    ====** Methods **==========================================================
085        \*---------*/
086    /**
087     *  {@inheritDoc}
088     */
089    @Override
090    public final String getSortKey() { return Integer.toString( m_Index ); }
091
092    /**
093     *  Returns the index of this argument.
094     *
095     *  @return The index.
096     */
097    public final int index() { return m_Index; }
098
099    /**
100     *  {@inheritDoc}
101     */
102    @Override
103    public final String toString() { return StringUtils.format( required() ? "%s" : "[%s]", metaVar() ); }
104}
105//  class CLIArgumentDefinition
106
107/*
108 *  End of File
109 */
